SELECT BEANWISHNO, B1.BEANNO, B1.USERNO, B2.BEANNO, B2.BEANIMGNO, B2.BEANNAME, B2.ORIGIN, B2.BEANCOMM, B2.BEANINFO, B2.BEANPRICE, B2.BUSINESSNO, B3.BEANIMGNO, B3.BEANORIGINNAME FROM BEANWISH B1 INNER JOIN BEAN B2 ON B1.BEANNO = B2.BEANNO INNER JOIN BEANIMG B3 ON B2.BEANIMGNO = B3.BEANIMGNO
USERNO = #{userNo}

SELECT m.quizresult, m.userno, b1.BEANNO, b1.BEANNAME, b2.BEANORIGINNAME, c.CUPNOTENAME, g.GRINDNAME, e.EXTRACTIONNAME FROM MEMBERQUIZRESULT m INNER JOIN QUIZRESULT q ON m.QUIZRESULT = q.QUIZRESULTNO INNER JOIN bean b1 ON q.BEANNO = b1.BEANNO INNER JOIN beanimg b2 ON b2.BEANIMGNO = b1.BEANIMGNO INNER JOIN BEANTASTE b3 ON b1.BEANNO = b3.BEANNO INNER JOIN CUPNOTE c ON b3.CUPNOTENO = c.CUPNOTENO INNER JOIN GRIND g ON q.GRIND = g.GRINDNO INNER JOIN EXTRACTION e ON q.EXTRACTION = e.EXTRACTIONNO
m.USERNO = #{userNo}

userId = #{userId}

SELECT r.revNo, r.beanNo, r.subNo, r.userNo, r.revCont, r.revDate , b.beanNo, b.beanName FROM BeanRev r JOIN BEAN b ON r.beanNo = b.beanNo WHERE userNo = #{userNo} ORDER BY r.revDate DESC
